verses.verse: This <S%G2532><s%> is the Revelation <S%G602><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> gave <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> to show <S%G1166><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> servants <S%G1401><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> happen soon, <S%G1096><s%> <S%G1722><s%> which <S%G2532><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> made known <S%G4591><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> his <S%G846><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> servant, <S%G1401><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%>

who <S%G3739><s%> testified <S%G3140><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%>'s word, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> about <S%G5037><s%> everything that <S%G3745><s%> he saw. <S%G1492><s%>

Blessed <S%G3107><s%> is he who reads <S%G314><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> those who hear <S%G191><s%> the words <S%G3056><s%> of the prophecy, <S%G4394><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> the things that are written <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> it, <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is at hand. <S%G1451><s%>

John, <S%G2491><s%> to the <S%G1577><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> assemblies <S%G1577><s%> that are in <S%G1722><s%> Asia: <S%G773><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> to you <S%G5213><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> from <S%G575><s%> God, <S%G5607><s%> who is and <S%G2532><s%> who was <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who is to come; <S%G2064><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> the <S%G4151><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> are <S%G2076><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> his <S%G846><s%> throne; <S%G2362><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> from <S%G575><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> the faithful <S%G4103><s%> witness, <S%G3144><s%> the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the ruler <S%G758><s%> of the kings <S%G935><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%> To him who loves <S%G25><s%> us, <S%G2248><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> washed <S%G3068><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> from <S%G575><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> sins <S%G266><s%> by <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> blood; <S%G129><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> he made <S%G4160><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to be a Kingdom, <S%G935><s%> <S%G2532><s%> priests <S%G2409><s%> to his <S%G846><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Father; <S%G3962><s%> to him <S%G846><s%> be the glory <S%G1391><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the dominion <S%G2904><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> he is coming <S%G2064><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> the clouds, <S%G3507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> will see <S%G3700><s%> him, <S%G846><s%> including <S%G2532><s%> those who <S%G3748><s%> pierced <S%G1574><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> the tribes <S%G5443><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> will mourn <S%G2875><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> him. <S%G846><s%> Even so, <S%G3483><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

"I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> the Alpha <S%G1><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the Omega, <S%G5598><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> God, <S%G5607><s%> "who is and <S%G2532><s%> who was <S%G2258><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> who is to come, <S%G2064><s%> the Almighty. <S%G3841><s%>"

I <S%G1473><s%> John, <S%G2491><s%> <S%G2532><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> partner <S%G4791><s%> with you in <S%G1722><s%> oppression, <S%G2347><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> Kingdom, <S%G932><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> perseverance <S%G5281><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> was <S%G1096><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the isle <S%G3520><s%> that is called <S%G2564><s%> Patmos <S%G3963><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>'s Word <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1223><s%> the testimony <S%G3141><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

I was <S%G1096><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G2250><s%> Lord <S%G2960><s%>'s day, <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> behind <S%G3694><s%> me <S%G3450><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> a trumpet <S%G4536><s%>

saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G3739><s%> you see, <S%G991><s%> write <S%G1125><s%> in <S%G1473><s%> a book <S%G975><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> send <S%G3992><s%> to the seven <S%G2033><s%> assemblies: <S%G1577><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Ephesus, <S%G2181><s%> Smyrna, <S%G4667><s%> Pergamum, <S%G4010><s%> Thyatira, <S%G2363><s%> Sardis, <S%G4554><s%> Philadelphia, <S%G5359><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Laodicea. <S%G2993><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I turned <S%G1994><s%> to see <S%G991><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> that <S%G3748><s%> spoke <S%G2980><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> me. <S%G1700><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Having turned, <S%G1994><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> golden lampstands. <S%G5552><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722><s%> among <S%G3319><s%> the <S%G2033><s%> lampstands <S%G3087><s%> was one like <S%G3664><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> clothed <S%G1746><s%> with a robe reaching down to his feet, <S%G4158><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with a golden <S%G5552><s%> <S%G99999><s%> sash <S%G2223><s%> around <S%G4314><s%> his chest. <S%G3149><s%>

<S%G846><s%> His <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his hair <S%G2359><s%> were white <S%G3022><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> white <S%G3022><s%> wool, <S%G2053><s%> like snow. <S%G5510><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> eyes <S%G3788><s%> were like <S%G5613><s%> a flame <S%G5395><s%> of fire. <S%G1161><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> were like <S%G3664><s%> burnished brass, <S%G5474><s%> as if <S%G5613><s%> it had been refined <S%G4448><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a furnace. <S%G2575><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> of <S%G5204><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> waters. <S%G5204><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> He had <S%G2192><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> right <S%G1188><s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Out of <S%G1537><s%> his <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> proceeded <S%G1607><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> two-edged <S%G1366><s%> sword. <S%G4501><s%> <S%G2532><s%> His <S%G846><s%> face <S%G3799><s%> was like <S%G5613><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> shining <S%G5316><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> its <S%G846><s%> brightest. <S%G1411><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> the Living <S%G2198><s%> one. <S%G2532><s%> I was <S%G1096><s%> dead, <S%G3498><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> forevermore. <S%G1519><s%> <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%> <S%G2532><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> the keys <S%G2807><s%> of Death <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of Hades. <S%G86><s%>

Write <S%G1125><s%> therefore the things which <S%G3739><s%> you have seen, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> are, <S%G1526><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the things which <S%G3739><s%> will <S%G3195><s%> happen <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3326><s%> hereafter; <S%G5023><s%>

the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you saw <S%G1492><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> right hand, <S%G1188><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the seven <S%G2033><s%> golden <S%G5552><s%> lampstands. <S%G3087><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> stars <S%G792><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> the angels <S%G32><s%> of the seven <S%G2033><s%> assemblies. <S%G1577><s%> <S%G2532><s%> The seven <S%G2033><s%> lampstands <S%G3087><s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1492><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> seven <S%G2033><s%> assemblies. <S%G1577><s%>"
